text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde mbararari. Nde ntige khar mbui bigeŋ, maaŋ muuŋgip kha ŋgui gari guman panan vharir ŋaara guman pan kha kameŋ mbararagirga, ana guigira nza suaŋv suaŋgirga. Ana nza suaŋ suaŋv khaŋ suaŋgirga, nza bigɨna mbatɨga mueŋ khavi. Nza ntige khar mbui bigeŋ, ne guigira nɨɨeŋ ki fhuvara. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgip zɨv nzan nzaŋv khaŋ nza suanga, ‘Nde thaŋ nzuav zav, khaŋ kav wari fhura tamtam kaai.’ Mbe maaŋ suanga, nza mben ŋgarkarga buna thueŋ ki fhu.”
